3rd Party License Information
Projity's Project-ON-Demand and OpenProj use the following 3rd party Open Source projects. We thank their creators and contributors for their fine work!

Apache Batik SVG Toolkit http://xmlgraphics.apache.org/batik/ license

XStream http://xstream.codehaus.org/ license

Projity has modified some of the above libraries to make them run better inside an applet. These modifications are used for Project-ON-Demand, not OpenProj. You can find those modified versions here.

If you prefer email to downloading, we can email you copies of any of the libraries listed above as well as the Projity-modified ones.

This product includes software developed by The Apache Software Foundation (http://www.apache.org/).
